{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Dryas Wood|It|Dryas Wood}} is a small hollow nestled between the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region|Fontaine Research Institute]] and [[Erinnyes Forest]]. It used to be the "backyard" of the Institute, and was home to various plant nurseries. It is said that the potioneer who created [["Pure Water"]] once lived here in seclusion to work on it.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Villains}}</ref></p>}}
